description: 13. Is it safe to travel to West African countries?
title: 13. Is it safe to travel to West African countries?
content:
Yes, but only essential travel is advised and travellers are advised to:
-- Avoid travel to affected regions.
--  Avoid contact with persons suffering from Ebola or any other illness.
--  Do not touch cloths and beddings used by persons suffering from Ebola. 
--  Avoid unnecessary body contact like shaking hands and gathering in groups.
